name: Divi Torque Lite – Divi Theme and Extra Theme
author: DiviEpic

sections.description:
Divi Torque Lite’s ever-growing suite of professional and reliable modules will help you save time and money, taking your website to the next level.

Check the Demos

Unlock all features with Divi Torque Pro.

Divi Website builder is required for this plugin.

20+ FREE MODULES üî•

Divi Torque Lite includes 20+ free modules for professional and engaging websites:

  • Icon Box ‚Äì Merge icons and text harmoniously with the Divi Icon Box, illustrating concepts or services in a visually appealing and informative manner.

  • Contact Form 7 Styler ‚Äì Seamlessly integrate the popular Contact Form 7 plugin with the Divi Contact Form 7 module, facilitating easy and efficient communication for users.

  • Separator ‚Äì Use the Separator module to add clear and customizable dividers between sections, enhancing your site’s structure and readability.

  • Skill Bar ‚Äì Showcase skills and competencies with the Skill Bar module, featuring animated bars that visually represent proficiency levels.

  • Divi Logo Grid ‚Äì Present a clean and organized collection of logos with the Logo Grid module, ideal for highlighting clients, partners, or sponsors professionally.

  • Person ‚Äì Use the Person module to showcase team members or individual profiles, complete with photos, biographies, and social media links.

  • Testimonial ‚Äì The Testimonial module lets you easily add testimonial blocks to your website. Use these sections to showcase client, customer, or user feedback, reviews, or quotes.

  • Info Box ‚Äì The Info Box module is perfect for highlighting important information with customizable boxes, combining text and icons for clear communication.

  • Info Card ‚Äì Similar to the Info Box, the Info Card module lets you present key details in an engaging card format, enhancing your content’s visual appeal.

  • Dual Button ‚Äì Enhance your call-to-action with the Dual Button module, offering two interactive buttons that guide users towards different actions.

  • Before & After Slider ‚Äì Enable users to compare two images with the Before & After Slider module effortlessly. Featuring an interactive slider, it‚Äôs perfect for highlighting transformations or contrasts.

  • Image Carousel ‚Äì Enhance your website’s design with the Image Carousel module. Select beautiful photos and customize slider options to create the perfect image carousel for your site.

  • Logo Carousel ‚Äì Elegantly showcase client or partner logos with the Divi Logo Carousel, displaying your affiliations and enhancing your credibility.

  • Twitter Feed Carousel ‚Äì Display tweets in a sleek carousel format with the Twitter Feed Carousel module, keeping your audience engaged with dynamic content.

  • Twitter Feed ‚Äì Integrate your Twitter feed directly into your site, keeping visitors updated with your latest tweets and interactions.

  • Number ‚Äì Use the Number module to highlight statistics or key figures, making important numbers stand out on your site.

  • Video Modal ‚Äì Embed videos with the Divi Video Modal, offering a sleek and responsive viewing experience that harmoniously integrates with your site’s aesthetic.

  • Scroll Image ‚Äì Integrate vertical or horizontal scrolling images with the Divi Image Scroll, adding depth and intrigue to your site while uniquely presenting your content.

  • News Ticker ‚Äì Keep your audience informed with the News Ticker module, displaying real-time updates or important announcements.

  • Post List ‚Äì Organize and display blog posts or articles in a list format, enhancing content navigation and accessibility.

  • Review Box ‚Äì Showcase customer feedback using the Divi Review Box, highlighting testimonials that build trust and credibility for your brand in a visually appealing manner.

  • Flip Card ‚Äì Show images and text cards that flip to reveal additional content on the other side when clicked.

  • Animated Text ‚Äì Capture attention with the Animated Text module, which allows you to create dynamic and engaging text animations.

  • Business Hours ‚Äì Display your business’s hours and opening times with the Opening Hours module.

  • Gradient Heading ‚Äì The Divi Gradient Heading adds a vibrant touch to your text, utilizing stunning gradient effects to draw attention and enhance visual appeal.

  • Inline Notice ‚Äì The Inline Notice module is a simple Divi module that helps you highlight important notes. Its ready-to-use box lets you quickly add text. You can customize the look with layouts, colors, and typography options.

SUPPORT THAT CARES! ‚õëÔ∏è

We know you want a good product with strong support. We’re here to answer your questions and help you use our plugin effectively.


Need help? We are just a click away!

CONNECT WITH OUR TEAM AND COMMUNITY üåê

  • https://twitter.com/diviepic
sections.installation:
Note: This plugin works with Divi. Make sure you have Divi Theme installed.

Install the Torque Modules either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.

For more information, please visit our Knowledge Base.
sections.faq:
Is Divi Torque free?

Yes! Divi Torque Lite’s features are and always will be free.

Can I use Divi Torque Lite without Divi Theme/Builder?

I‚Äôm afraid, you cannot use Divi Torque Lite without Divi Theme/Builder.

Will Divi Torque Lite break my site after an update?

No, It won‚Äôt break your site or any page where you used our plugin. We put our best effort to make you happy. But we always recommend keeping a backup of your site before updating our plugin. In case anything happens you can revert and contact our support team immediately.
sections.changelog:
Version 4.0.5

Fix: Divi Library Shortcode issue
Fix: Infobox overlay issue
Added: Custom Icon for Video Modal

Version 4.0.4

Fix: Image overlay issue – Showing blue images

Version 4.0.3

Fix: Post Lists module issue
Fix: News Ticker module issue

Version 4.0.2

Fix: SVN version issue 4.0.0 to 4.0.1
Added: Loading icon to rollback button

Version 4.0.1

Fix: Resolved various user-facing issues encountered during the update from version 3.6.6 to 4.0.0.

Version 4.0.0

  • Fix: Security issues
  • Added: Module on-load demos
  • Added: New module manager
  • Update: Revamp dashboard
  • Update: Clean codebase

Version 3.6.6

  • Fix: Moduuels php error

Version 3.6.5

  • Fix: Module deprecated warnings

Version 3.6.4

  • Fix: Modules php error

Version 3.6.3

  • Fix: Big close icon issue.

Version 3.6.2

  • Added a single folder for all modules
  • Fix: Modules security issues with 6.2
  • Fix: Swap image issues

Version 3.6.1

  • Security Update

Version 3.6.0

  • Deprecated popup extension
  • Deprecated login designer extension
  • Deprecated the admin page
  • Clean codebase
  • Remove freemium

Version 3.5.0

  • Clean Code

Version 3.0.0

  • Rebranding BrainAddons to Divi Torque

Version 2.0.0

  • Codebase optimize

Version 1.0.0

  • Public beta release

short_description: Enhance Divi with advanced modules for faster website creation. Build your site effortlessly with powerful Divi modules!
